name: Eggs With A Vengeance
description:
Crack Your Friends in Eggs With A Vengeance!

Brawl with your friends as you fling yolk! Dash for extra speed and become the last egg splatted!

Music by Ozzed http://ozzed.bandcamp.com/

Gamepads required to play

2-4 players

Thanks For Playing!!

A to Jump, Left Stick To Move.

Press X, Y, or B to fling some yolk!!
